page.title: 07CHAPEL,Yeoford Chapel.
page.content: {Yeoford chapel}is 84 years old. There are 47 graves and the newest one is two and a half years old. The oldest one being 156 years old. Gravestones cost from Â£275 to Â£2,000.The{chapel cost Â£100 to build. It was built in 1901 and is made of brick. There are 32 benches in the{chapel,}so there is plenty of room.The{chapel}has suffered only minor damages, such as a broken window.They have both a piano and an organ so they can play all the songs and hymns they want.Quite a few years ago there was a flood around the {chapel}in the middle of a service. Someone rushed in and told everybody and then everybody rushed out. They do not have a bell in the{chapel but bells are expensive. There were no other buildings before the{chapel} but the Christians used to meet in the house of a kind person.
